channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Assistant
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Assistant

item.title: CVE-2024-34661|2024-09-04T05:32:47.507Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20assistant
item.description: Improper handling of insufficient permissions in Samsung Assistant prior to version 9.1.00.7 allows remote attackers to access location data. User interaction is required for triggering this vulnerability.
